Detailed Description

Derived from CoherentLightSource, representing a hemispherical light source.

Class HemisphericalSource is a random light source that emits in an hemisphere from its center and uniformly

boost::shared_ptr< Photon > HemisphericalSource::random_photon (  )  [virtual]

Randomly generates a Photon.

Generates a photon with a random direction in the hemisphere starting from this source's center.
